explains: n. 内地；穷乡僻壤；靠港口供应的内地贸易区

sentences.en: Bailyn argues that the colonies were a half-civilized hinterland of the European culture system.
sentences.cn: 贝林认为，殖民地是欧洲文化体系的半文明腹地。
中国的经济腹地依然广阔。

sentences.en: It takes a while to get used to the ways of people from Azerbaijan's rural hinterland.
sentences.cn: 在阿塞拜疆腹地的，我慢慢习惯了人们的行事方式。
